registered_owner.name: Maria Santos
registered_owner.address: 425 East 58th Street, Apt 12B, New York, NY 10022

vehicles.damage_description: Moderate rear-end damage to bumper, trunk, and rear quarter panels. Rear lights broken. Estimated $8,500 damage.
Front bumper damage, hood dented, grille broken. Estimated $6,200 damage.

drivers.name: Maria Santos
drivers.address: 425 East 58th Street, Apt 12B, New York, NY 10022

witnesses.name: David Chen
witnesses.statement_summary: Witness was standing on corner waiting to cross. Observed Vehicle 1 (blue Honda) stopped at red light. Vehicle 2 (white pickup) came up behind and struck Vehicle 1 without braking. Stated driver of Vehicle 2 appeared to be looking down, possibly at phone.

witnesses.name: Jennifer Walsh
witnesses.statement_summary: Witness was in vehicle behind Vehicle 2. Observed Vehicle 2 strike Vehicle 1 without stopping. Did not see Vehicle 2 brake lights illuminate before impact.

narrative: On Friday, March 15, 2024, at approximately 1435 hours, I, PO Rodriguez, responded to the scene of a motor vehicle accident at Third Avenue and East 42nd Street. Upon arrival, I observed two vehicles in the northbound lane of Third Avenue. Vehicle 1, a blue 2021 Honda Accord operated by Maria Santos, was stopped at a red traffic signal facing northbound. Vehicle 2, a white 2019 Ford F-150 operated by Robert Thompson and owned by Johnson Delivery Services LLC, was traveling northbound behind Vehicle 1. Vehicle 2 failed to stop and struck the rear of Vehicle 1. Driver Thompson stated he did not see Vehicle 1 stopped. Two independent witnesses stated they observed Vehicle 2 strike Vehicle 1 without braking, and one witness stated the driver appeared to be looking down. EMS Unit 45 responded and transported Driver Santos to Bellevue Hospital for treatment of neck and back pain. Driver Thompson was issued a summons for VTL 1129(a) - Following Too Closely.
officer_observations: Vehicle 1 sustained moderate rear-end damage. Vehicle 2 had front-end damage. Skid marks were not observed on roadway prior to point of impact. Traffic signal was confirmed to be functioning properly. Photos taken of both vehicles, scene, and traffic control devices.

fault_indicators.apparent_fault: Driver of Vehicle 2 (Robert Thompson) failed to maintain safe following distance and struck rear of stopped Vehicle 1. Witnesses observed V2 driver looking down before impact.
